channel.title: Major Minor on
channel.description: Recent content in Major Minor on

item.title: Yellow Belly
item.description: [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/mirrors/lights_out.md#everyday-i-ask-myself-how-long-is-this-to-continue-vyl-wnanory|You were built for blessing, but you only make them bleed, but you don’t care.]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/mirrors/lights_out.md#everyday-i-ask-myself-how-long-is-this-to-continue-vyl-wnanory|And bruises are but shadows of the blackness that you breed, but you don’t care.
